title: How ‘Clanker’ Became an Anti-A.I. Rallying Cry
description: The term, which was popularized by a “Star Wars” show and is rooted in real frustrations with technology, has become a go-to slur against artificial intelligence and robots.
content:
In the television show “Battlestar Galactica,” they were called toasters. In the film “Blade Runner,” skinjobs. Now in the culture war against robots and artificial intelligence chatbots, a new slur has emerged.
“Clanker.”

title: House bill seeks to regulate AI use
description: MANILA, Philippines — A bill that aims to regulate the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in the country has been filed in the House of Representatives.
content:
MANILA, Philippines — A bill that aims to regulate the use of artificial intelligence (AI) in the country has been filed in the House of Representatives.

title: Guillermo del Toro says his ‘Frankenstein’ is not an AI metaphor: ‘We live in a time of terror and intimidation’
description: Guillermo del Toro's reimagining of ‘Frankenstein’ stars Jacob Elordi as the Creature and Oscar Isaac as the scientist. Del Toro emphasises the film's focus on humanity and emotional depth rather than artificial intelligence, presenting a layered family drama that explores themes of abandonment.
content: Oscar-winning filmmaker Guillermo del Toro has finally unveiled his long-awaited reimagining of Frankenstein, starring Jacob Elordi as the Creature and Oscar Isaac as the obsessive scientist who brings him to life. Premiering at a press conference on... [2198 chars]

title: As AI becomes part of everyday life, it brings a hidden climate cost
description: Marissa Loewen first started using artificial intelligence in 2014 as a project management tool.
